extension.description: A basic Tvheadend client without live TV functionality.[CR]Get EPG and manage recordings on a Tvheadend server.[CR]Basic user interface with separate selection lists for channels and EPG entries and yes/no dialogs for scheduling/cancelling/deleting recordings.[CR]Recording indications in front of list entries:[CR][error message, if any]-[recording status][CR] [R] = recording[CR] [S] = scheduled[CR] [C] = completed[CR] [M] = missed
